Description: Gold pendant, bifrontal head of Hathor on staff.
Curator's comments: Published: Andrews, Amulets of Ancient Egypt (1994): p.81
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 2006-2007 6 Oct-18 Feb, Tokyo, National Museum of Nature and Science, Mummy: The Inside Story 2007 17 Mar-17 Jun, Kobe City Museum, Mummy: The Inside Story
